duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching, for all restaurant employees.
Maintain high retention by focusing on identifying qualified applicants, developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging employee productivity.
Oversee the restaurant condition to ensure compliance with company policies & procedures, as well as Health Department Standards.
Oversee and implement all merchandising and marketing programs.
Use P&L and store reports to affect change.
Perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching, as well as occasional lifting up to 50 pounds.
